title: Achilles Tendon Science
description: A fast breakdown of Achilles Tendon Science for builders.

hook.text: The Achilles tendon bears forces up to 12 times your body weight during running. It's also the most ruptured tendon.

buildup.text: It's the thickest tendon in the body, connecting calf muscles to the heel bone. Every step loads it.
